app-description: TradeRep — Reputation of traders verified by blockchain
page-title-default: TradeRep — Reputation of traders verified by blockchain
page-footer-default: TradeRep — Reputation of traders verified by blockchain © 2022
page-home-advantage-1-subtitle: That cannot be faked because all data is stored in an immutable blockchain
page-home-advantage-2-subtitle: Which will help identify who really understands the market and who only pretends to
page-home-how-it-works-subtitle: Steps that allow to build a trustworthy reputation and filter out scammers
page-home-how-it-works-row-1-title: Send a forecast to the blockchain
page-home-how-it-works-row-1-subtitle: This way the community will be sure that your market analysis has not been tampered with or recorded retroactively.
page-home-how-it-works-row-2-subtitle: A blockchain-based smart contract will verify your forecast. If the market confirms it, your reputation will be raised, otherwise lowered.
page-home-how-it-works-row-3-subtitle: Together we will determine who understands the market better than anyone else and who is trying to deceive others.
page-beta-step-1-title: Connect a wallet to access the TradeRep application.
page-beta-step-2-title: For now, TradeRep application is only available to members of the private club EARLY ADOPTERS.
page-beta-step-2-subtitle: To join the club and start earning a reputation before anyone else, you need to fill out the form.
page-beta-step-3-title: Welcome to the private club EARLY ADOPTERS!
page-beta-step-3-subtitle-2: TradeRep application will be available to you soon. We'll send an email when it happens.
page-beta-step-3-subtitle-3: For now, you can invite your friends to the club. Keep in mind that places are limited.
page-feedback-title: Do you have a question or suggestion?
page-feedback-subtitle: Write to us, we will be glad to help!
dialog-about-feature-1-subtitle: Each member of a private club receives an NFT with a unique number.
dialog-about-feature-2-subtitle: Only 142 lucky people will be able to join the private club EARLY ADOPTERS.
dialog-about-feature-3-subtitle: Members of the private club get a special badge that helps them stand out among the other traders.
dialog-about-feature-4-subtitle: As a club member, you recognize that your reputation as a trader is not just empty words to you.
dialog-about-feature-5-subtitle: Which will be revealed as the project progresses to all members of the private club EARLY ADOPTERS.
dialog-join-club-title: Form to join the club EARLY ADOPTERS
input-email-help: We will send information on the next steps to this email.
input-yourselft-help: How long have you been trading? What exchanges do you usually use? Share your Telegram channel or blog, if you have one.
